column1: Smoque BBQ////Brisket: Boring. It was a bit dry. According to their website
column3: rich smoke flavor is complemented by a 2-layer spice rub." Sorry
column5: there was absolutely no spice rub or smoke flavor in the 1/2 lb to 1 lb of brisket that I had. Luckily
column6: I was able to use the Carolina and Spicy Memphis BBQ sauces to flavor the brisket.
